Message of Sympathy to Iranian President 
   Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of sympathy to Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, president of Iran, in connection with the big losses of human lives caused by an airliner catching fire in Mashhad City, Iran.
 The message expressed deep condolences and sympathy to the Iranian president and through him to the victims and their bereaved families.
